abstract: Microsoft has hired a former Wal-Mart executive to spearhead a second attempt at retail stores.
snippet: Microsoft has hired a former Wal-Mart executive to spearhead a second attempt at retail stores.
lead_paragraph: Remember Clippy, that talking paper clip who used to pop up in Microsoft Office and offer to guide you through the confusing byways of the program?

headline.main: Will Clippy Be a Greeter at Microsoft’s New Stores?
